original_text: Then they will know my rules and my laws. They will be careful to obey them. They will be my people and I will be their God.
korean_text: 내 율례를 따르며 내 규례를 지켜 행하게 하리니 그들은 내 백성이 되고 나는 그들의 하나님이 되리라

sentences.original_text: Then they will know my rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들이 나의 규례를 알게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will be careful to obey them
and I will be their God
